summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.3°C) and outside temperature (up 2.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.9 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1774 m), light levels (up 5389 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 190.1m lower than yesterday, 674.3m lower than the past week, 1774.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 713m and a high of 1594m, averaging 876.9m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and very little to no wind will be present. Periods of rain anticipated, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Changeable conditions.
